Dragon Helmet

helmet (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 170
armor id [armor]: 227 (Magic Helmet)
protection, head [prothead]: 22
darkvision [darkvision]: 50
resist fire [fireres]: +5
morale bonus [morale]: +5

Requires 5F to forge (F1)

In addition to becoming resistant to fire, the wearer of this helmet will be able to see in the dark and will be incredibly brave in battle.
